Posts.Content: Actually they where suppose to give me the glute When I started my A/c,,,(they for got to tell me) It is suppose to help your muscles and joints through any Chemo. I don't know if you can get it at Walmarts. YOU can get it at a health food store or at a GNC. GEt the powder. You can take the pills but they are big and you would have to take to many of then a day to get the dosage you need. YOU take 2 teaspoons of powder(I mix it in orange juice)3 times a day. I just mix it in less than half a glass of juice. I will probably use it the rest of my life because it is good for the joints and muscles. HOwever I don't really know if it has helped me or not with the chemos. THe taxol I am taking now I have had alot of pain with my bones and muscles. But I have only 1 more treatment Thank the Lord!!!!! THen it is on to radiation. My prayers are with you through your ordeal. Hang in there!!! Steph
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Taxotere

Posts.Content: thanks mim for your response. I did A/c 4 rounds and 2 weeks apart then of course now on the taxotere 4 rounds and 2 weeks apart. Don't know how you survived 12 rounds of the stuff!!! BUt it like you said we got to do it for the greater good! It's just not much fun.....lol I just have 3 more to go then my radiation. Then Arimidex for 5 yrs. Well I lost my hair of course 14 days into A/C and it hasn't come back yet and like you said I can forget it until finished with Chemo, However I haven't lost my eyebrows yet,,I realize I still could. And yes my nails look terrible already!!! I have been using the oil on them from the beginning so hopefully I won't lose any I hear some women do. Are you finished with all your treatments? ANds good luck with the hair growth hope it grows in fast for you!!! Steph
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Taxotere

Posts.Content: thank you for responding to my problem! I go tomarrow for my 2nd round so we shall see. Are you still in treatment sresthadasi? Hope you are doing good! We got to keep the faith, These treatments really suck!!! lol Steph
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Taxotere

Posts.Content: I had my first treatment this last tuesday of taxotere. Thursday same week the palms of my hands and bottoms of my feet turned so red to almost purple couldn't walk which upset me since that was all I had to do for enjoyment since starting my treatments of a/c then this taxotere. I thought it would be a walk throuh a park compared to a/c boy was I wrong. I also broke out into a sever rash.Mu husband went to my treatment center Fri,morning to let them know I needed some help they told him to go buy some L glutamine to keep me form getting further damage to my nerves. Which I started taking immediatly, But Mon, was no better, so I went up there and showed the Nurses what was going on plus I was also throwing up. when they saw me I think it scared them, They immediatly put me in treatment chair and started an IV of nausea medicine and steriods. Then sent in a subscription of steriods for me to take. I am feeling alot better now thank goodness. But the Nurses said that they are sure my oncologist will do something different at my next treatment which is a week from this Tues, He better cause I don't think I can go through all that again, Do any of you know of an alternative to taxotere other than taxol. THey are to much alike I think.
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Taxotere

Posts.Content: they took me off of taxotere, My last 2 treatments of been taxol. Just had 7th treatment Tuesday, Last night I started feeling the effects of it. hands and feet going numb, and if it is like the last one I had my bones and muscles will starting hurting today and I will have nausea. oh well I just have one more treatment left,It is scheduled for the 3rd of Oct!!!!! then on the radiation. DOwn hill from here, I am so ready for it to be overwith and wanting my hair to start growing back!!!!! We have already started getting some very chilly mornings and I am freezing!!!! I need my hair back and my weight back!!! Steph
Posts.Title: Took me Off of Taxotere
